Package hex

Interface Summary
HexConstants  
 

Class Summary
hexblob a service class for the hex board/robot to keep track of blobs of like-colored markers.
hexCell specialized cell used for the game hex, not for all games using a hex board.
hexChip this is a specialization of chip to represent the stones used by hex; and also other tiles, borders and other images that are used to draw the board.
hexConnection  
HexConstants.StateStack  
HexGameViewer This is intended to be maintained as the reference example how to interface to boardspace.
Hexmovespec  
HexPlay the Robot player only has to implement the basic methods to generate and evaluate moves.
 

Enum Summary
HexConstants.HexId  
HexConstants.HexState  
HexConstants.HexVariation
